definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: measure (NH id.; Ph. [[מדד]]; Ar. mad=a extend, stretch, mad=un a corn-measure, etc.; As. madâdu, measure; Jew.-Aram. n. [[מִידָּה]] measure, proportion, rule);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. ´[[מ]] ([[מָדָָד]]) Is 40:12 + 9 t. Ez; sf. [[מְדָדוֹ]] Ez Eze 42:15, Eze 42:20; 1 S. [[וּמַדּׂתִ֫י]] Is 65:7; [[וּמָֽדְדוּ]] consec. De 21:2, Ez Eze 43:10; [[וּמַדּׂתֶם]] consec. Nu 35:5; Impf. [[וַיָּ֫מָד]] Ru 3:15 + 22 t. Ez; 2 ms. [[תָּמוֹד]] Ez Eze 45:3; [[וַיָּמׂ֫דּוּ]] Ex 16:18; [[תָּמׂ֫דּוּ]] Ez Eze 47:18; Inf. [[לָמׂד]] Zec 2:6; —measure, chiefly lit. (usu. sq. acc. rei; obj. om. Ex 16:18, De 21:2, Ez Eze 40:35, cf. Eze 47:18 (but v. Co); sq. acc. of measure Ru 3:15, Ez Eze 42:19, Eze 47:3, Eze 47:4, Eze 47:4; Eze 47:5);—
measure of length, distance Nu 35:5 (P), De 21:2 (D), Ez Eze 40:5, Eze 40:6, Eze 40:8, Eze 40:20 + 32 t. Ez Eze 40–Eze 47, Zec 2:6.
fig. of measuring waters Is 40:12 (of ´[[י]]); of requital Is 65:7. †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִמַּד]] Ho 2:1, Je 33:22; [[יִמַּדּוּ]] Je 31:37; —be measured, of sand of sea Ho 2:1, Je 33:22; of heavens Je 31:37. †
extend, continue (= make extent or continuation), subj. [[עֶרֶב]] Job 7:4.
measure, measure off, [[בַחֶבֶל]], of apportioning Moabites to death and life, sq. sf. 2Sa 8:2; also obj. [[חֲבָלִים]] v:2Sa 8:2; metaph. of conquest, sq. acc., Ps 60:8 = Ps 108:8 (‖[[חִלֵּק]]).

definitions.title: Po.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיְמׂ֫דֶד]] Hb Hab 3:6 (subj. God, obj. [[אֶרֶץ]]), measured (viz. with eye) Vulgate Hi AV RV, but dub.; LXX e)saleu/qh, Targum [[אֲזִיעַ]], hence shook Ew Ke Or al. (fr. √ [[[מוֹד]] =] [[מוֹט]], but rd. then rather [[וַיְמׂטֵט]], although [[מוט]] not elsewhere in this conj.; We, plausibly, [[וַיְמׂגֵג]] √ [[מוג]], cf. Na 1:5). †

definitions.title: Hithpo.
definitions.body: [[וַיִּתְמׂדֵד]] sq. [[עַל־הַיֶ֫לָד]]; 1Ki 17:21 measured (= extended, stretched) himself upon the boy.
